title: Zibrant LIVE! constructs perfect pitch for National House Building Council awards
text:
Zibrant LIVE! constructs perfect pitch for National House Building Council awards Zibrant LIVE! constructs perfect pitch for National House Building Council awards Details Category: Agency & Association   15:45 Zibrant LIVE!, the award winning creative communications agency, was appointed by the National House Building Council (NHBC) to deliver their prestigious and nationally recognised Health & Safety Awards ceremony at the ICC Birmingham on 3rd July 2015. . 
The account win followed an intensive four-way pitch in which Zibrant LIVE! imaginatively demonstrated a fresh approach to the project, succeeding over a number of high-profile industry competitors with their portfolio of innovative and creative ideas. The ceremony brought together 360 guests to recognise excellence and achievement in the health and safety in housing construction, as well as raising the industry standard by showcasing and sharing best practice. Commenting on the win, Mark Rose, director of creative and production at Zibrant LIVE! said: “There is no doubt that this was a tough pitch which required a great deal of creativity within a short timeframe. 18 months since our launch it’s great to see that the teams imaginative and innovative approach, has cemented our reputation as a leading experiential agency. We are delighted to be working with NHBC and particularly on this awards ceremony which challenged and stretched the team to deliver win-win results”. Nikki Merritt, events manager from NHBC added: “The event was a great success and truly lived up to the expectation we had of Zibrant following an exceptionally strong pitch, bursting with creativity. The Health and Safety awards are a very important event in our calendar and Zibrant delivered a visually engaging event with confidence and style. We look forward to working with them in the future.” Zibrant LIVE! is a creative communications division of Zibrant overseen by Mark Rose, with creative spearheaded by Mark Glynne-Jones. Zibrant LIVE! offices are based across the UK in Derby, Milton Keynes and Godalming. Related articles
